name: Pain Keeper

skills.name: Unflagging Advance
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 10%.

effects.notes: Hybrid DEF + ATK scaling. Damage Multiplier: DEF + ATK. Hits 2 times.
Fills own Turn Meter by 10% after attacking. Helps with speed tuning and turn cycling.

skills.book_value: Moderate priority - +35% damage total (5%+5%+5%+10%+10%). Increases personal damage in CB/dungeons, but A3 is critical priority.
skills.notes: Hybrid scaling (DEF + ATK) makes gear flexible. 2 hits help with FK shield. TM boost helps maintain turn order in unkillable comps.

skills.name: Spectacular Sweep
skills.description: Attacks all enemies, then heals all allies by 15% of this Champion's MAX HP.

effects.notes: AOE damage with HP + ATK scaling. Damage Multiplier: 0.12 HP + 2 ATK. Low multiplier, primarily a healing skill.
AOE heal based on Pain Keeper's MAX HP. Scales from 15% (unbooked) to 50% (fully booked). CRITICAL for sustain in Budget Unkillable comps.

skills.book_value: High priority - +35% heal total (5%+5%+10%+15%) AND -1 turn cooldown (5→4 turns). Dramatically improves sustain for unkillable comps. Book after A3.
skills.notes: Heal scales from HER MAX HP, not target's. Build HP% to increase heal amount. Fully booked: 50% HP heal on 4-turn CD = massive sustain for Budget Unkillable. Damage is secondary - healing is the primary value.

skills.name: Combat Tactics
skills.description: Decreases the cooldown of all allies skills by 1 turn.

effects.notes: Reduces ALL ally cooldowns by 1 turn. THE CORE MECHANIC for Budget Unkillable - enables Maneater's Block Damage to cycle faster. Does NOT reduce own cooldowns.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL - MUST fully book A3 (3 books: 7→6→5→4 turns). Reduces cooldown from 7 to 4 turns. MANDATORY for Budget Unkillable to function. Highest priority for all books.
skills.notes: THIS IS WHY PAIN KEEPER IS S-TIER. A3 enables Budget Unkillable comp with Maneater by cycling Block Damage faster. MUST be fully booked to 4-turn CD or the comp breaks. Priority: A3 books > A2 books > A1 books. In BatEater comp, she uses this on cooldown to maintain unkillable rotation.

forms.aura: Increases Ally HP in Faction Crypts by 21%.
forms.comments: Pain Keeper is the budget queen of Clan Boss. Despite being a Rare, she's S-tier for enabling Budget Unkillable and BatEater comps. Her A3 cooldown reduction is irreplaceable. DO NOT FEED even if you pull Legendary supports - she's unique.

stat_priorities: HP% primary (scales heal on A2, improves survivability)
SPD for speed tuning (varies by comp - CB 171-191, general 180-200)
DEF% secondary (hybrid scaling on A1, survivability)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: HP% 40,000-50,000 (scales A2 heal), SPD 171-191 (comp dependent for Budget Unkillable/BatEater), DEF% 1,500+ (survivability), RES 150-200 (avoid debuffs). NO ACC needed.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: HP% 35,000+, SPD 180-200, DEF% 1,200+, RES 100+. Balance heal scaling with survivability.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: HP% 40,000+, SPD 200-250, DEF% 1,500+, RES 200+ (tanky support). Focus on sustain and turn cycling.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: HP% 35,000+, SPD 180-200, DEF% 1,200+, RES 150+. Similar to dungeons.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: HP% 30,000+, SPD 170-190, DEF% 1,000+. Aura: +21% HP in Faction Crypts (excellent for squishy Dark Elves).

recommended_gear: CLAN BOSS (Budget Unkillable/BatEater): Lifesteal + Speed sets. HP% gloves/chest/boots OR SPD boots. HP% ring. HP amulet. RES banner. Substats: HP%, SPD, DEF%, RES. Speed tune to comp requirements (171-191 SPD).
DUNGEONS: Lifesteal + Speed OR Immortal + Speed. HP% gloves/chest, SPD boots. HP% ring/amulet. RES banner. Substats: HP%, SPD, DEF%.
ARENA: Speed + Immortal OR Regeneration + Speed. HP% gloves/chest, SPD boots (200-250). HP% ring/amulet. RES banner. Focus on sustain and turn cycling.
GENERAL: Always prioritize HP% for heal scaling. Lifesteal recommended for most content. Speed tune carefully for CB comps - she must go in specific order for unkillable to work.

clan_boss: Support Tree: Steadfast, Healing Savior (boost heal on A2), Lore of Steel, Spirit Haste, Lasting Gifts, Cycle of Magic
Defense Tree: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Rejuvenation, Shadow Heal, Delay Death, Retribution

Offense Tree: OPTIONAL - Keen Strike, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Methodical, Warmaster (if building damage). Many Budget Unkillable users skip offense tree entirely and focus Support/Defense for sustain.
dungeons: Similar to CB - Healing Savior, Spirit Haste for cooldown cycling, Defense tree for survivability. Warmaster optional for damage.
arena: Support/Defense focus - Healing Savior, Lore of Steel, Spirit Haste, Cycle of Magic, Delay Death, Retribution. Skip offense tree for tanky support build.
doom_tower: Similar to dungeons - Support/Defense balance with Healing Savior and Spirit Haste.
faction_wars: Similar to dungeons - balanced Support/Defense with Healing Savior for team sustain.
masteries.general: Support/Defense trees are priority. Healing Savior boosts A2 heal. Spirit Haste helps cycle A3 faster. Warmaster is optional - many users skip for full sustain build in unkillable comps.

blessings: Phantom Touch (Debuffer) - extra debuff chance (low priority, she has no debuffs)
Brimstone (Tank) - reflects damage while supporting (low priority)
Polymorph (Arena defense) - clutch save mechanic (niche use)
NOTE: Blessings are low priority for Pain Keeper - her value is mechanics, not stats/damage. Save blessings for main DPS.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI uses A3 (cooldown reduction) on sub-optimal turns - sometimes wastes it when allies have no skills on cooldown. For CB, always manual to control A3 timing. For dungeons/auto content, AI is acceptable but not optimal. CRITICAL: In unkillable comps, she MUST be manualed or use AI turn optimizer tools to ensure proper rotation.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Budget Unkillable (with Maneater) and BatEater (with Maneater + Bateater)
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Pain Keeper is THE enabler for Budget Unkillable Clan Boss comps. Her A3 (cooldown reduction) allows Maneater's Block Damage skill to cycle faster, creating permanent unkillable uptime. CORE COMPS: 1) BUDGET UNKILLABLE (2-key UNM): Pain Keeper + Maneater + 3 DPS/Poisoners. Speed tune: Pain Keeper 220 SPD, Maneater 218 SPD, DPS 190-200 SPD. Pain Keeper uses A3 to cycle Maneater's Block Damage (4-turn CD → 3-turn effective with reduction). 2) BATEATER (1-key UNM): Pain Keeper + Maneater + Doompriest + 2 DPS. More complex speed tune: Pain Keeper 246 SPD, others tuned around her. Uses her A3 + Doompriest cleanse for full unkillable + cleanse loop. REQUIREMENTS: A3 MUST be fully booked (4-turn CD). Speed tuning is CRITICAL - use deadwoodjedi.com calculator. All allies in Lifesteal gear. SYNERGIZES WITH: Maneater (required partner), Frozen Banshee (poison), Geomancer (HP Burn + Reflect), any DEF-based DPS. VALUE: Enables F2P/budget players to 2-key or 1-key UNM Clan Boss with no Legendary champions required. DO NOT FEED - she's irreplaceable for budget unkillable.

mechanics_advisory:
Pain Keeper is deceptively powerful - a Rare champion with Legendary-tier impact for Clan Boss. Her value:

1. CLAN BOSS (10/10): Core of Budget Unkillable and BatEater comps. A3 cooldown reduction enables permanent Block Damage uptime with Maneater. MUST be fully booked and speed-tuned. Can enable 2-key or 1-key UNM for F2P.

2. DUNGEONS (7/10): Solid support with AOE heal and cooldown cycling. A3 helps allies use skills more often. Not meta but functional.

3. ARENA (7/10): Tanky HP support with sustain. Cooldown reduction helps nukers cycle faster. Niche use in sustain/control teams.

4. FACTION WARS (6/10): Good Dark Elves support. +21% HP aura helps squishy faction. Heal and cooldown reduction valuable for progression.

KEY SYNERGIES:
- Maneater: Required partner for Budget Unkillable (her A3 cycles his Block Damage)
- Frozen Banshee: Poison specialist for CB damage
- Geomancer: HP Burn + Reflect for CB
- Doompriest: Cleanse for BatEater comp variant
- Any DPS: Benefits from cooldown reduction

AVOID PAIRING WITH:
- Champions that manipulate turn meter (breaks unkillable speed tune)
- Champions with passive cooldown reduction (redundant)

SPEED TUNING:
- Budget Unkillable: 220 SPD (Pain Keeper), 218 SPD (Maneater), 190-200 SPD (DPS)
- BatEater: 246 SPD (Pain Keeper), complex tune for others
- Dungeons/Arena: 180-250 SPD depending on role

BOOKING PRIORITY: A3 FIRST (mandatory), A2 second (heal boost), A1 last (optional). DO NOT use in unkillable comp until A3 is fully booked or rotation breaks.

DO NOT FEED: Despite being Rare, she's S-tier and irreplaceable. Many endgame players use multiple Pain Keepers for different comps or keep extras for potential future use.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats manually provided by user via screenshot - 100% accurate (HP: 19,320, ATK: 969, DEF: 771, SPD: 102, C.RATE: 15%, C.DMG: 50%, RES: 40, ACC: 0). All skills and info from Ayumilove (canonical source).

citations: Deadwood Jedi CB Calculator: https://www.deadwoodjedi.com/speed-tunes-4/budget-unkillable (BatEater speed tuning reference)
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Pain Keeper is the F2P/budget Clan Boss champion. Rare rarity, S-tier impact. Enables unkillable comps without Legendary champions. MUST be fully booked (A3 priority) and speed-tuned correctly. DO NOT FEED. User Priority: Clan Boss UNM (Priority 1) - Pain Keeper is CRITICAL for budget unkillable strategy.

update_notes.last_patch: No recent changes - Pain Keeper kit has been stable since launch. Budget Unkillable strategy discovered by community post-launch.
